name: Matisse Mazur
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
10/29/2017 


To whom this may concern: 


My name is Matisse Mazur and I'm 31 years old, born in New York City, and grew up in Vienna, Austria. Making me bilingual in German fluently. With a sincere passion and ambition towards film from a very young age, I always knew where my final destination would be, and always had the concrete plan. To move to Los Angeles and pursue and obtain a career in some capacity in the film industry. 

I started out studying Film at the New York Film Academy at Universal. Although it was a fantastic experience, I still maintain that one could really only learn best with first hand experiences on set. I’ve got an invaluable amount of Customer Service skills to match up with my positivity, and absolutely love working in teams, however I have no problem hitting the ground running, since I’m a definite self-starter, and won’t really need my hand held. Apart from that, I’m always punctual and organized and I’d be stoked to hear back from you, so we could get started as soon as possible. Of course I do also possess my medical card, and am pretty knowledgable when it comes to strains, edibles, and cartridges.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

I am available at your request for an interview any time – any day, I’m flexible and have open availability.


Respectfully, 

Matisse Mazur 
(818) 406-0118
